product_name: REI Expedition-Weight Long Underwear Bottoms - Boys'
long_description: Our warmest thermal bottoms for boys, the soft and thick REI Expedition-Weight long underwear bottoms make an excellent next-to-skin layer for winter adventures in extreme cold. Non-pilling polyester fleece draws moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Elastic waist; gusseted crotch; flat seams.
